content: Jan 9 BP Plc and Anadarko Petroleum Corp  narrowly failed to persuade a U.S appeals court to reconsider its 2014 ruling that they could face civil fines under federal pollution laws over the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill.

title: BP  Anadarko fail to win new review of Gulf spill fines
